stories.text:
I believe I've reached a point in my career, and used Terraform enough, that I can confidently say that the semver system for managing IAC code bases simply doesn't cut it anymore.

I'd love more widespread feedback on how I currently propose we version control our IAC. If the feedback is constructive and forthcoming, I'll move this written piece to a more formal location.

This is currently being tested, with extremely positive results, at Cisco (yeah, the networking company.)
stories.title: Show HN: A better way of version controlling IAC
Scientists reveal origin of mammal evolution milestone: warm-bloodedness

stories.text:
Error: "Operation failed with unexpected error."

Will update as I find out more.

Singapore, Australia, NZ & Japan confirmed so far.

"We've received reports of users being unable to access Microsoft Teams or leverage any features. We're investigating the issue and further updates can be found in your Service Health Dashboard via TM402718."

https://twitter.com/MSFT365Status/status/1549934141738651648

My partner is still in her meeting in Teams and managed to disconnect and rejoin it. Seems a little odd.
stories.title: Microsoft Teams is down – worldwide?
Microsoft Teams Is Down - "Operation failed with unexpected error."
